readable.content: A boy in blue and red trunks , with a green ball in his hand . is jumping into a pool . A boy is jumping into the water with a ball in his hand . A boy jumps into a pool while holding a ball . boy in floral swim trunks jumps into the pool Boy in red and blue flowered trunks jumps into pool holding green ball .
